meanings.definition: A small rough drawing or sketch intended to be a guide for a larger work.
meanings.sent1: I quickly sketched a thumbnail of the landscape before starting the painting.
meanings.sent2: She showed me a thumbnail of the design before creating the final artwork.
meanings.sent3: The artist's thumbnail of the portrait looked more like a stick figure!
meanings.sent4: His thumbnail of the building was so detailed, it almost looked real.
meanings.sent5: The thumbnail of the map helped us plan our route more easily.

meanings.definition: The small, thick, inner digit of the human hand, next to the forefinger.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally hit her thumbnail with the hammer while working on the project.
meanings.sent2: He painted his thumbnail with a bright color to match his outfit.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the moving thumbnail on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her thumbnail was sore after gardening all day.
meanings.sent5: He tapped his thumbnail on the table impatiently.
